channel.title: War Linux Iraq Screensaver on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in War Linux Iraq Screensaver on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Wheeeee
item.description: Sweet.. cynthesizer (2:21:09 PM): gross. linuxKILLa (2:21:19 PM): what cynthesizer (2:21:28 PM): the iraq resolution just passed like two minutes ago. linuxKILLa (2:21:38 PM): goddamnit cynthesizer (2:22:08 PM): I know. linuxKILLa (2:22:16 PM): what exactly does that mean cynthesizer (2:22:50 PM): it basically means that congress is showing solidarity with the president and gives him war powers. it hasn’t passed the senate yet though. Check it out here…. hehe.
